sentences.en: It was his custom to approach every problem cautiously.
sentences.cn: 谨慎地处理每个问题是他的习惯。

sentences.en: David moved cautiously forward and looked over the edge.
sentences.cn: 大卫小心翼翼地向前移动，视线越过边缘看过去。

sentences.en: She climbed the staircase cautiously, holding fast to the rail.
sentences.cn: 她紧握扶手，小心翼翼地爬上楼梯。
